# apiruns-cli

Apiruns CLI is a tool to make self-configurable rest API. Create an API rest has never been so easy.

## Requirements

- Python 3.6+

## Installation.

```bash
poetry install
```

# Example

```bash
apiruns --help

 Usage: apiruns [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...
 
╭─ Options───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --help          Show this message and exit.                                │
╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─ Commands ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ build                                   Build API                          │
│ version                                 Get current version.               │
╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
```
